CustomField.inlineHelpText: Where you considered a shorter period than 10 clear days appropriate in the circumstances, was it the patientâ€™s death or loss of capacity to provide informed consent that was deemed imminent?
CustomField.label: Reason IF less than 10 days:

value.fullName: 2 - Patient's loss of capacity to provide informed consent
value.label: 2 - Patient's loss of capacity to provide informed consent

value.fullName: 3 - Both patient's death and loss of capacity
value.label: 3 - Both patient's death and loss of capacity
